abstract: The owner of the Toronto Stock Exchange threw its backing behind a $3.8 billion buyout deal from Maple Group, a consortium of Canadian financial players and pension funds.
snippet: The owner of the Toronto Stock Exchange threw its backing behind a $3.8 billion buyout deal from Maple Group, a consortium of Canadian financial players and pension funds.
lead_paragraph: The TMX Group, owner of the Toronto Stock Exchange, on Sunday threw its backing behind a $3.8 billion buyout offer from the Maple Group, a consortium of Canadian financial players and pension funds.

headline.main: TMX Board Backs Maple's $3.8 Billion Takeover Bid
